alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Sumner; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 12:28AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Davidson, southwestern Sumner and northwestern Wilson Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1226 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Joelton, or near Nashville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, Lakewood, Hermitage, Rural Hill, Old Hickory, Joelton, Green Hill, Bells Bend, Whites Creek, Beaman Park, Percy Priest Lake, Gladeville and Bledsoe Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
